snippet.title: ST Soccer Quick Play - Atari ST
snippet.description:
Quick play through of the game ST Soccer running on an Atari ST emulator with the original sound (not some over dubbed music). 
This game was released in 1988 by Microdeal. 
It's not very good. It took me a while to realise you have to press space to get the computer to take throw ins and goal kicks. You can barely pass and if you try and run with the ball the computer just takes it from you and it's very hard to get the ball back. If you try and do anything at all in your own penalty area you concede a penalty. It's a bug ridden mess. Enjoy.
